/usr/bin/c++   -g    CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CMainLoop.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstElement.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstSource.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstAudioConverter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstAudioResampler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstVoiceActivityDetector.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/CGstSpeechRecognizer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sphinx.dir/main.cpp.o  -o sphinx -rdynamic -lgstreamer-0.10 -lgobject-2.0 -lgmodule-2.0 -lgthread-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -lxml2
